snippet: Creating the time and space for employees to take breaks as a group can improve morale and raise productivity.
abstract: Phyllis Korkki Workstation column observes that creating the time and space for employees to take breaks as a group can improve morale and raise productivity.
lead_paragraph: Creating the time and space for employees to take breaks as a group can improve morale and raise productivity.
